mapper.insert: insert into dm values( dm_seq.nextval, #{senderNo}, #{receiverNo}, #{dmContent}, sysdate, 0, #{senderId}, #{senderName} )
mapper.select: select dm_no as dmNo, sender, receiver, member_nickname as senderName, dm_content as dmContent, to_char(dm_date,'yy-mm-dd') as dmDate, read_check as readCheck from dm where receiver = #{receiverNo}
